question:
Tourism is an ever growing industry.
What benefit do you think tourism brings to individuals and society?
text: Over the last few decades, the world has seen that the development of tourism industry. I think it brings a lot of benefits to both individuals and our society. This essay will firstly some advantages of this issue.

One of the principle advantages of tourism is a job. This because of the fact that this created more job opportunities for people, especially the local resident. For example, a restaurant near the beach employs a variety kinds of stuff which means more jobs are in need. As a result, the proportion of unemployed people will decrease, the money that society spend for them is less and they also have a job to make their life. Moreover, they can contribute to our society. This would encourage them to work more efficiently and effectively

The main advantage associated with the development of tourism industry relates to the freedom of mind. By having a good service in tourism, people would be free to choose whatever they want to travel. As a result. this would have positive effects on their mental attitudes towards their work, study as well as their lives. They have a wide range of choice and location they want to discover with one of the best qualities all around the world. According to the Hanoimoi survey, 85% of student reckon their study performance has improved greatly in term of efficiency when they have freedom. Thus it encourages them to travel more often which should promote the local economy.
To sum up, I would argue there is sufficient benefit of the travel industry, therefore it will be level up in the future for the better life.
